title: Which music services are supported on the Apple HomePod Mini?
content:
The HomePod Mini takes a bit of a different approach from the rest of today’s best smart speakers. There’s an ecosystem play involved from Apple just like Amazon and Google, but Siri is much less fleshed out as an AI voice assistant platform. You can use a HomePod Mini to control your smart home, but

The post Which music services are supported on the Apple HomePod Mini? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The HomePod Mini is no longer just an Apple Music-only speaker, here are all the other music services you can use with it.
